full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA LHA AARYA RE MANTA LA BSANGS MCHOD MDOR BSDUS BSAM DON MYUR 'GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES RTA LHA AARYA RE MANTA LA BSANGS MCHOD MDOR BSDUS BSAM DON MYUR 'GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI CHOS RJE BLA MA MCHOG MGRON GNYER BDE CHEN DBANG PHYUG GIS NAN TAN BSKUL NGOR AA KYA HU THUG THUS 'PHRAL 'DIR SBYAR BA 'DI YI GE PA NI DBU MDZAD NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS BRIS PA'O, ,)
